content.text: Match ends, Southampton 4, Manchester City 2.
Second Half ends, Southampton 4, Manchester City 2.
Wilfried Bony (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Victor Wanyama (Southampton).
Hand ball by Raheem Sterling (Manchester City).
Sadio Mané (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aleksandar Kolarov (Manchester City).
Jesús Navas (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Ryan Bertrand (Southampton).
Substitution, Southampton. Jay Rodriguez replaces Dusan Tadic.
Raheem Sterling (Manchester City) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Cuco Martina (Southampton).

James Ward-Prowse (Southampton) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Martín Demichelis (Manchester City).
Nicolás Otamendi (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dusan Tadic (Southampton).
Goal!  Southampton 4, Manchester City 2. Kelechi Iheanacho (Manchester City) left footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Jesús Navas.
Foul by Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City).
Sadio Mané (Southampton) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Jesús Navas (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is high and wide to the right.
Substitution, Southampton. James Ward-Prowse replaces Steven Davis.
Goal!  Southampton 4, Manchester City 1. Sadio Mané (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Dusan Tadic with a through ball.
Corner,  Southampton. Conceded by Joe Hart.
Attempt saved. Virgil van Dijk (Southampton) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal.

Offside, Southampton. Steven Davis tries a through ball, but Cuco Martina is caught offside.
Goal!  Southampton 3, Manchester City 1. Sadio Mané (Southampton) left footed shot from very close range to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Jose Fonte with a headed pass following a corner.
Attempt saved. Virgil van Dijk (Southampton) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Steven Davis with a cross.
